meanings.definition: A type of fish that can live both in water and on land.
meanings.sent1: Mudskippers are unique because they can move between water and land.
meanings.sent2: We saw a group of mudskippers near the shore, hopping around.
meanings.sent3: The mudskippers decided to have a beach party, splashing in the waves.
meanings.sent4: Like mudskippers, she navigated through different environments effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The mudskippers' ability to breathe air sets them apart from other fish.
